description.english: Become a Grand Master.
description.french: Atteindre la Grande Maîtrise.
description.italian: Diventa un Gran Maestro.
description.russian: Получите высочайшее мастерство.
description.polish: Zostań Wielkim Mistrzem.
description.brazilian: Torne-se um Grande Mestre.

description.english: Complete the game solo.
description.french: Finir le jeu sans recruter de compagnon.
description.italian: Completa il gioco da solo.
description.russian: Пройдите игру одним персонажем.
description.polish: Ukończ grę w pojedynkę.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo apenas com o teu personagem.

description.english: Complete the game on Legacy of Bhaal difficulty.
description.french: Finir le jeu en mode Succession de Bhaal.
description.italian: Completa il gioco alla difficoltà Retaggio di Bhaal.
description.russian: Пройдите игру на уровне сложности «Наследие Баала».
description.polish: Ukończ grę na poziomie trudności Dziedzictwo Bhaala.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo na dificuldade Legado de Bhaal.

description.english: Complete the game on Story Mode difficulty.
description.french: Finir le jeu en mode Histoire.
description.italian: Completa il gioco alla difficoltà Modalità Storia.
description.russian: Пройдите игру на уровне сложности «Сюжетный режим».
description.polish: Ukończ grę w Trybie opowieści.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo na dificuldade Modo Estória.

description.english: Increase an attribute score to 25.
description.french: Atteindre 25 dans un score de caractéristique.
description.italian: Aumenta il punteggio di una caratteristica a 25.
description.russian: Повысьте любой параметр персонажа до 25.
description.polish: Podnieś cechę do wartości 25.
description.brazilian: Aumente um atributo para 25.

description.english: Have an Armor Class of -15 or lower.
description.french: Atteindre -15 en Classe d'Armure.
description.italian: Ottieni una Classe Armatura pari o inferiore a -15.
description.russian: Понизьте класс брони до −15 или менее.
description.polish: Uzyskaj Klasę Pancerza -15 lub niższą.
description.brazilian: Tenha uma Classe de Armadura -15 ou menor.

displayName.french: On ne Laisse Personne en Arrière !

description.english: Finish the game without any party members dying.
description.french: Finir le jeu sans qu'aucun compagnon ne meure durant la confrontation finale.
description.italian: Completa la partita senza che nessun membro del gruppo sia morto.
description.russian: Закончите игру, не дав умереть ни одному персонажу в группе.
description.polish: Ukończ grę, nie tracąc żadnego członka drużyny.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo sem que nenhum membro da equipe morra.

displayName.french: On ne Fait Pas d'Omelette Divine...

description.english: Finish the game with a full party of dead allies.
description.french: Finir le jeu avec vos cinq compagnons décédés durant la confrontation finale.
description.italian: Completa la partita con un gruppo di alleati morti.
description.russian: Закончите игру с пятью мертвыми персонажами в группе.
description.polish: Ukończ grę, tracąc wszystkich członków drużyny.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo com uma equipe inteira de aliados mortos.

description.english: Reach 150 Hit Points.
description.french: Atteindre 150 Points de Vie.
description.italian: Raggiungi 150 Punti Ferita.
description.russian: Наберите 150 пунктов здоровья.
description.polish: Zdobądź 150 punktów życia.
description.brazilian: Alcance 150 Pontos de Vida.

description.english: Acquire Heroic reputation.
description.french: Atteindre une réputation héroïque.
description.italian: Ottieni la reputazione Eroico.
description.russian: Заработайте геройскую репутацию.
description.polish: Osiągnij reputację Heroiczny.
description.brazilian: Adquira Reputação Heroica.

description.english: Acquire Despised reputation.
description.french: Atteindre une réputation méprisée.
description.italian: Ottieni la reputazione Disprezzato.
description.russian: Заработайте презренную репутацию.
description.polish: Osiągnij reputację Pogardzany.
description.brazilian: Adquira Reputação Desprezado.

description.english: Kill 1,000 creatures.
description.french: Tuer 1000 créatures.
description.italian: Uccidi 1000 creature.
description.russian: Убейте 1000 существ.
description.polish: Zabij 1000 istot.
description.brazilian: Mate 1.000 criaturas.

description.english: Have a Lore skill of 100 or more.
description.french: Atteindre 100 en score de connaissances.
description.italian: Raggiungi un punteggio di Conoscenza pari o superiore a 100.
description.russian: Повысьте параметр «Знание легенд» до 100 и более.
description.polish: Uzyskaj współczynnik Wiedza na poziomie 100 lub więcej.
description.brazilian: Tenha uma habilidade de Conhecimento de 100 ou mais.

description.english: Become a Fallen Paladin or a Fallen Ranger.
description.french: Devenir un Paladin ou Rôdeur déchu.
description.italian: Diventa un Paladino Decaduto o un Ranger Decaduto.
description.russian: Станьте падшим паладином или падшим следопытом.
description.polish: Zostań upadłym paladynem lub łowcą.
description.brazilian: Torne-se um Paladino ou Mateiro Caído.

displayName.french: Le Plus Beau Jour de ma Vie !

description.english: Have Bless, Chant, and Luck active at the same time.
description.french: Être affecté en même temps par les effets de Bénédiction, Cantique et Chance.
description.italian: Litania, Benedizione e Fortuna attivi contemporaneamente.
description.russian: Получите единовременно эффекты от заклинаний «Благословение», «Распев» и «Удача».
description.polish: Aktywuj jednocześnie zaklęcia Błogosławieństwo, Psalm i Szczęście.
description.brazilian: Tenha Benção, Louvação e Sorte ativadas ao mesmo tempo.

description.english: Have Disease, Fatigue, and Poison active at the same time.
description.french: Subir en même temps la Maladie, le Poison et l'Épuisement.
description.italian: Veleno, Fatica e Malattia attivi contemporaneamente.
description.russian: Получите единовременно эффекты от болезни, усталости и отравления.
description.polish: Bądź pod jednoczesnym wpływem efektów choroby, zmęczenia i trucizny.
description.brazilian: Tenha Doença, Fadiga e Veneno ativados ao mesmo tempo.

description.english: Leave Candlekeep, the only home you've ever known.
description.french: Quitter Château-Suif, le seul foyer que vous ayez connu.
description.italian: Lascia Candlekeep, la sola casa che tu abbia mai conosciuto.
description.russian: Покиньте Кендлкип, ваш единственный дом.
description.polish: Opuść Candlekeep, jedyny dom, jaki znasz.
description.brazilian: Saia da Fortaleza da Vela, o único lar que você conheceu.

displayName.english: Friendly Faces at the Friendly Arm
displayName.polish: Przyjazne twarze w Gospodzie „Pod Pomocną Dłonią”.

description.english: Speak to Khalid and Jaheira at the Friendly Arm Inn.
description.french: Parler à Khalid et à Jaheira à l'auberge du Brasamical.
description.italian: Parla con Khalid e Jaheira alla Locanda del Braccio Amico.
description.russian: Поговорите с Кхалидом и Джахейрой в гостинице «Дружеская рука».
description.polish: Porozmawiaj z Khalidem i Jaheirą w gospodzie „Pod Pomocną Dłonią”.
description.brazilian: Fale com Khalid e Jaheira na Estalagem do Braço Amigo.

displayName.french: Une Victoire qui a Bonne Mine

description.english: Killed Mulahey and ended the threat to the Nashkel mines.
description.french: Tuer Mulahey et mettre un terme à la menace des mines de Nashkel.
description.italian: Uccidi Mulahey e libera le miniere di Nashkel dalla sua minaccia.
description.russian: Убейте Мулахея и разберитесь с ситуацией в шахтах Нашкеля.
description.polish: Zabij Mulaheya i zażegnaj niebezpieczeństwo grożące kopalniom Nashkel.
description.brazilian: Matou Mulahey e acabou com a ameaça nas Minas de Nashkel.

description.english: Ended the bandit threat to the Sword Coast.
description.french: Mettre un terme au problème des bandits de la Côte des Épées.
description.italian: Libera la Costa della Spada dalla minaccia dei banditi.
description.russian: Остановите набеги бандитов на Побережье Мечей.
description.polish: Połóż kres bandytom nękającym Wybrzeże Mieczy.
description.brazilian: Acabou com a ameaça dos bandidos na Costa da Espada.

displayName.italian: Acqua, Acqua da Tutte le Parti

description.english: Killed Davaeorn and shut down his mining operation.
description.french: Tuer Davaëorn et mettre un terme à ses opérations minières.
description.italian: Uccidi Davaeorn e poni fine alla sua operazione mineraria.
description.russian: Убейте Даваэорна и прекратите его деятельность в шахте.
description.polish: Zabij Davaeorna i przerwij jego działalność w kopalni.
description.brazilian: Matou Davaeorn e acabou com sua operação na mina.

description.english: Reported Rieltar's activities to Duke Eltan in Baldur's Gate
description.french: Rapporter les activités de Rieltar au Duc Eltan à la Porte de Baldur.
description.italian: Riferisci le attività di Rieltar al Duca Eltan a Baldur's Gate.
description.russian: Доложите Герцогу Элтану во Вратах Балдура о деятельности Риелтара.
description.polish: Zdaj księciu Eltanowi raport dotyczący działań Rieltara we Wrotach Baldura.
description.brazilian: Relatou as atividades de Rieltar a Duque Eltan em Portão de Baldur.

displayName.brazilian: Eu e Eu Mesmo... De Novo

description.english: Made your way through the catacombs beneath Candlekeep.
description.french: Sortir des catacombes de Château-Suif.
description.italian: Fatti strada attraverso le catacombe sotto Candlekeep.
description.russian: Проберитесь через катакомбы под Кендлкипом.
description.polish: Przedrzyj się przez katakumby rozciągające się pod murami Candlekeep.
description.brazilian: Sobreviveu às catacumbas sob a Fortaleza da Vela.

displayName.french: Héros de la Porte de Baldur

description.english: Killed Sarevok and ended his threat to Baldur's Gate and the Sword Coast.
description.french: Tuer Sarevok et mettre un terme à la menace qu'il fait peser à la Porte de Baldur et la Côte de
description.italian: Uccidi Sarevok e libera Baldur's Gate e la Costa della Spada dalla sua minaccia.
description.russian: Убейте Саревока и покончите с исходившей от него угрозой Вратам Балдура и всему Побережью Мечей.
description.polish: Zabij Sarevoka i połóż kres zagrożeniu, jakie stanowi dla Wrót Baldura i całego Wybrzeża Mieczy.
description.brazilian: Matou Sarevok e acabou com sua ameaça a Portão de Baldur e a Costa da Espada.

description.english: Side with Silke against the mercenaries in Beregost.
description.french: Se ranger du côté de Silke face aux mercenaires à Bérégost
description.italian: Alleati con Silke contro i mercenari a Beregost.
description.russian: Примите сторону Силке против наемников в Берегосте.
description.polish: Stań po stronie Silke w sporze z najemnikami z Beregostu.
description.brazilian: Alie-se a Silke contra os mercenários em Beregost.

displayName.french: Pire Garde du Corps de Tous les Temps
displayName.italian: Peggiore Guardia del Corpo di Sempre

description.english: Side with the mercenaries against Silke in Beregost.
description.french: Se ranger du côté des mercenaires face à Silke à Bérégost.
description.italian: Alleati con i mercenari contro Silke a Beregost.
description.russian: Примите сторону наемников против Силке в Берегосте.
description.polish: Stań po stronie najemników z Beregostu w ich sporze z Silke.
description.brazilian: Alie-se aos mercenários contra Silke em Beregost.

description.english: Discover who let the kobolds into Gullykin.
description.french: Découvrir qui a fait rentrer les kobolds à Gullykin.
description.italian: Scopri chi ha fatto entrare i coboldi a Gullykin.
description.russian: Узнайте, кто впустил кобольдов в Галликин.
description.polish: Odkryj, kto wpuścił koboldy do Gullykin.
description.brazilian: Descubra quem deixou os kobolds entrarem em Bueirinho.

description.english: Return Drienne's cat.
description.french: Rapporter son chat à Drienne.
description.italian: Riporta il gatto a Drienne.
description.russian: Верните кошку Дриенн.
description.polish: Zwróć Drienne jej kotka.
description.brazilian: Retorne o gato de Drienne.

description.english: Restore Tamah to life.
description.french: Ramener Tamah à la vie.
description.italian: Riporta in vita Tamah.
description.russian: Вызволите Тамах из каменного плена.
description.polish: Przywróć Tamah do życia.
description.brazilian: Retorne Tamah à vida.

description.english: Return Joseph's greenstone ring to his wife.
description.french: Rapporter l'anneau de néphrite de Josph à son épouse.
description.italian: Riporta l'anello di nefrite di Joseph a sua moglie.
description.russian: Отдайте кольцо Джозефа из зеленчака его жене.
description.polish: Zwróć żonie Józefa jego amulet z nefrytem.
description.brazilian: Retorne o anel de diorito de Joseph à esposa dele.

description.english: Save Hulrik's cow.
description.french: Porter secours à la vache d'Hulrik.
description.italian: Salva la mucca di Hulrik.
description.russian: Спасите корову Хулрика.
description.polish: Uratuj krowę Hulrika.
description.brazilian: Salve a vaca de Hulrik.

description.english: Side with Seniyad in the Cloakwood forest.
description.french: Se ranger du côté de Séniyad à la forêt de Bois-Manteau.
description.italian: Alleati con Seniyad nel Bosco Ammantato.
description.russian: Примите сторону Сенияда в лесу Клоаквуда.
description.polish: Stań po stronie Seniyada w Kniei Otulisko.
description.brazilian: Alie-se a Seniyad na Floresta do Manto.

description.english: Side with Aldeth Sashenstar in the Cloakwood forest.
description.french: Se ranger du côté d'Aldeth Sashenstar à la forêt de Bois-Manteau.
description.italian: Alleati con Aldeth Sashenstar nel Bosco Ammantato.
description.russian: Примите сторону Алдета Сашенстара в лесу Клоаквуда.
description.polish: Stań po stronie Aldetha Sashenstara w Kniei Otulisko.
description.brazilian: Alie-se a Aldeth Sashenstar na Floresta do Manto.

displayName.french: La Légende de la Tour de Durlag
displayName.italian: La Leggenda della Torre di Durlag
displayName.brazilian: A Lenda da Torre de Durlag

description.english: Explore Durlag's Tower and defeat the evil growing within it.
description.french: Explorer la Tour de Durlag et mettre un terme au Mal qui la hante.
description.italian: Esplora la Torre di Durlag e sconfiggi il male che la infesta.
description.russian: Исследуйте Башню Дурлага и победите зародившееся там зло.
description.polish: Zbadaj Wieżę Durlaga i pokonaj czające się tam zło.
description.brazilian: Explore a Torre de Durlag e derrote o mal que cresce dentro dela.

description.english: Appease the ghost in the Ulcaster ruins.
description.french: Apaiser le fantôme dans les ruines d'Ulcaster.
description.italian: Accontenta il fantasma nelle rovine di Ulcaster.
description.russian: Успокойте призрак Улкастера в руинах.
description.polish: Zaspokój pragnienie ducha w ruinach Ulcaster.
description.brazilian: Agrade o fantasma nas ruínas de Ulcaster.

description.english: Find and keep an artifact at the archaeological dig.
description.french: Trouver et garder un artéfact lors de fouilles archéologiques.
description.italian: Trova e conserva un artefatto allo scavo archeologico.
description.russian: Найдите и оставьте себе артефакт в археологических раскопках.
description.polish: Odszukaj i zachowaj dla siebie artefakt z wykopalisk archeologicznych.
description.brazilian: Encontre e fique com um artefato do sítio arqueológico.

description.english: Assist Charlston Nib at the archaeological dig.
description.french: Aider Charleston Nib lors des fouilles archéologiques.
description.italian: Aiuta Charleston Nib allo scavo archeologico.
description.russian: Поддержите Чарльстона Ниба в археологических раскопках.
description.polish: Pomóż Charlestonowi Nibowi podczas wykopalisk archeologicznych.
description.brazilian: Ajude Charleston Nib no sítio arqueológico.

description.english: Assist Gallor at the archaeological dig.
description.french: Aider Gallor lors des fouilles archéologiques.
description.italian: Aiuta Gallor allo scavo archeologico.
description.russian: Поддержите Галлора в археологических раскопках.
description.polish: Pomóż Gallorowi podczas wykopalisk archeologicznych.
description.brazilian: Ajude Gallor no sítio arqueológico.

description.english: Side with the fishermen near Baldur's Gate.
description.french: Aider les pêcheurs près de la Porte de Baldur.
description.italian: Alleati con i pescatori vicino a Baldur's Gate.
description.russian: Примите сторону рыбака в окрестностях Врат Балдура.
description.polish: Stań po stronie rybaków nieopodal Wrót Baldura.
description.brazilian: Alie-se aos pescadores perto de Portão de Baldur.

description.english: Return Tenya's stolen property.
description.french: Rendre à Tenya l'objet qui lui a été volé.
description.italian: Riporta a Tanya l'oggetto rubato.
description.russian: Верните украденную собственность Тани.
description.polish: Zwróć Tanyii skradzioną własność.
description.brazilian: Retorne o objeto roubado de Tanya.

description.english: Convince Captain Brage to return to the temple of Helm.
description.french: Persuader le Capitaine Brage de se rendre au temple de Heaum.
description.italian: Convinci il Capitano Brage ad andare al tempio di Helm.
description.russian: Убедите капитана Брейга вернуться в храм Хелма.
description.polish: Przekonaj kapitana Brage'a do powrotu do świątyni Helma.
description.brazilian: Convença o Capitão Brage a retornar ao templo de Helm.

displayName.polish: Sędzia, ława przysięgłych i kat w jednym

description.english: Put an end to Captain Brage's mad rampage.
description.french: Mettre un terme à la folie du Capitaine Brage.
description.italian: Poni fine alla folle ira del Capitano Brage.
description.russian: Покончите с безумием капитана Брейга.
description.polish: Położ kres szaleństwu kapitana Brage'a.
description.brazilian: Coloque um fim na violência furiosa do Capitão Brage.

description.english: Protect Prism until he completes his masterpiece.
description.french: Protéger Prisme jusqu'à ce qu'il puisse finir son œuvre d'art.
description.italian: Proteggi Prism fino al completamento del suo capolavoro.
description.russian: Защитите Призма, пока он не закончит свой шедевр.
description.polish: Chroń Prisma, dopóki nie ukończy swego arcydzieła.
description.brazilian: Proteja Prism até ele completar sua obra-prima.

description.english: Return the stolen emeralds to Oublek.
description.french: Rendre les émeraudes volées à Oublek.
description.italian: Riporta gli smeraldi rubati a Oublek.
description.russian: Верните Оублеку украденные изумруды.
description.polish: Zwróć skradzione szmaragdy Oublekowi.
description.brazilian: Retorne as esmeraldas roubadas a Oublek.

description.english: Help Abela the nymph escape.
description.french: Aider Abela la nymphe à s'échapper.
description.italian: Aiuta la ninfa Abela a fuggire.
description.russian: Помогите сбежать нимфе Абеле.
description.polish: Pomóż nimfie Abeli w ucieczce.
description.brazilian: Ajude Abela a ninfa a escapar.

description.english: Bring Casson's body to Tremain.
description.french: Rapporter le corps de Casson à Tremain.
description.italian: Porta il corpo di Casson a Tremain.
description.russian: Доставьте Тремайну тело Кассона.
description.polish: Przynieś Tremainowi ciało Cassona.
description.brazilian: Leve o corpo de Casson a Tremain.

description.english: Steal a telescope from the Hall of Wonders.
description.french: Voler le téléscope à la Maison des Merveilles.
description.italian: Ruba un telescopio dalla Sala delle Meraviglie.
description.russian: Украдите телескоп из Зала Чудес.
description.polish: Ukradnij teleskop z Komnaty Cudów.
description.brazilian: Furte um telescópio do Salão das Maravilhas.

description.english: Convince Marl to back down without resorting to violence.
description.french: Calmer Marl sans avoir recours à la violence.
description.italian: Convinci Marl a calmarsi senza ricorrere alla violenza.
description.russian: Убедите Марла отступить, не прибегая к насилию.
description.polish: Przekonaj Marla, by ten się wycofał, nie odwołując się przy tym do przemocy.
description.brazilian: Convença Marl a recuar sem o uso de violência.

description.english: Teach Marl a lesson.
description.french: Donner une leçon à Marl.
description.italian: Impartisci una lezione a Marl.
description.russian: Преподайте Марлу урок.
description.polish: Teach Marl a lesson.
description.brazilian: Ensine uma lição a Marl.

description.english: Finish all your chores before leaving Candlekeep.
description.french: Finir toutes vos corvées avant de quitter Château-Suif.
description.italian: Completa tutte le tue incombenze prima di lasciare Candlekeep.
description.russian: Выполните все поручения, прежде чем покинуть Кендлкип.
description.polish: Pozałatwiaj wszystkie sprawunki przed wyruszeniem z Candlekeep.
description.brazilian: Termine todos os teus afazeres antes de sair da Fortaleza da Vela.

description.english: Bring Firebead a copy of "The Fateful Coin."
description.french: Rapporter à Perleflamme une copie de l'Histoire de la Pièce Fatidique.
description.italian: Porta a Firebead una copia del libro Storia della Fatidica Moneta.
description.russian: Принесите Фаербиду книгу «История Монеты Судьбы».
description.polish: Przynieś Firebead'owi kopię „Historii Monety Losu".
description.brazilian: Leve a Firebead uma cópia do livro

description.english: Defeat Carbos and Shank.
description.french: Vaincre Carbos et Shank.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Carbos e Shank.
description.russian: Одолейте Карбоса и Шанка.
description.polish: Pokonaj Carbosa i Shanka.
description.brazilian: Derrote Carbos e Shank.

description.english: Send the witch Dynaheir to the afterlife.
description.french: Tuer la sorcière Dynahéir.
description.italian: Spedisci la strega Dynaheir nell'aldilà.
description.russian: Отправьте ведьму Динахейр в загробный мир.
description.polish: Wyślij wiedźmę Dynaheir w zaświaty.
description.brazilian: Mande a bruxa Dynaheir ao além.

description.english: Set the witch Dynaheir free from her prison.
description.french: Délivrer la sorcière Dynahéir de sa prison.
description.italian: Libera la strega Dynaheir dalla sua prigionia.
description.russian: Спасите ведьму Динахейр из лагеря гноллов.
description.polish: Uwolnij wiedźmę Dynaheir z jej więzienia.
description.brazilian: Liberte a bruxa Dynaheir de sua prisão.

description.english: Return the stone maiden at the Nashkel carnival to life.
description.french: Ramener la jeune femme de pierre du carnaval de Nashkel à la vie.
description.italian: Riporta in vita la donna pietrificata alla fiera di Nashkel.
description.russian: Освободите жрицу Бранвен из каменного плена.
description.polish: Przywróć do życia kamienną pannę na Jarmarku Nashkel.
description.brazilian: Retorne a donzela de pedra no festival de Nashkel à vida.

description.english: Have Neera, Dorn, and Rasaad in the party at the same time.
description.french: Avoir Neera, Dorn et Rasaad dans le groupe en même temps.
description.italian: Recluta nel gruppo Neera, Dorn e Rasaad contemporaneamente.
description.russian: Примите одновременно в группу Нииру, Дорна и Расаада.
description.polish: Miej w drużynie jednocześnie Neerę, Dorna i Rasaada.
description.brazilian: Tenha Neera, Dorn e Rasaad na equipe ao mesmo tempo.

description.english: Find Baeloth the Entertainer and convince him to join your party.
description.french: Trouver Baeloth l'Amuseur et le persuader de rejoindre votre groupe.
description.italian: Trova Baeloth l'Intrattenitore e convincilo ad unirsi al tuo gruppo.
description.russian: Найдите Баэлота Распорядителя и убедите его присоединиться к группе.
description.polish: Odszukaj Baelotha Artystę i przekonaj go, by dołączył do twojej drużyny.
description.brazilian: Encontre Baeloth o Anfitrião e o convença a se juntar à tua equipe.

description.english: Speak to all the Candlekeep tutors and learn what they have to teach you.
description.french: Parler à tous les tuteurs de Château-Suif et découvrez ce qu'ils ont à vous apprendre.
description.italian: Parla con tutti gli insegnanti di Candlekeep e apprendi le loro lezioni.
description.russian: Поговорите со всеми учителями в Кендлкипе и выслушайте их наставления.
description.polish: Porozmawiaj ze wszystkimi nauczycielami i dowiedz się, czego mogą cię nauczyć.
description.brazilian: Fale com todos os tutores da Fortaleza da Vela e aprenda o que eles têm a lhe ensinar.

description.english: Sent Tamoko to the afterlife.
description.french: Mettre un terme à la vie de Tamoko.
description.italian: Spedisci Tamoko nell'aldilà.
description.russian: Отправьте Тамоко в загробный мир.
description.polish: Wyślij Tamoko w zaświaty.
description.brazilian: Mande Tamoko ao além.

description.english: Convinced Tamoko to aid you.
description.french: Persuader Tamoko de vous aider.
description.italian: Convinci Tamoko ad aiutarti.
description.russian: Убедите Тамоко помочь вам.
description.polish: Przekonaj Tamoko, by ci pomogła.
description.brazilian: Convença Tamoko a te ajudar.

description.english: Destroyed the demon Aec'Letec.
description.french: Vaincre le démon Aec'Letec.
description.italian: Distruggi il demone Aec'Letec.
description.russian: Уничтожьте демона Аэк'Летека.
description.polish: Zniszcz demona o imieniu Aec'Letec.
description.brazilian: Destruiu o demônio Aec'Letec.

description.english: Dealt with Korlasz, the last follower of Sarevok.
description.french: Vaincre Korlasz, le dernier adepte de Sarevok
description.italian: Affronta Korlasz, l'ultima seguace di Sarevok.
description.russian: Разберитесь с Корлажем, последним последователем Саревока.
description.polish: Pokonaj Korlasz, ostatnią popleczniczkę Sarevoka.
description.brazilian: Lidou com Korlasz, a última seguidora de Sarevok.

description.english: Set out upon the journey to Dragonspear Castle.
description.french: Se mettre en route vers le Château de Lancedragon.
description.italian: Intraprendi il viaggio verso il Castello Dragonspear.
description.russian: Отправьтесь в путешествие к Замку Драконьего Копья.
description.polish: Wyrusz w podróż do Zamku Smoczej Włóczni.
description.brazilian: Partiu na jornada para o Castelo Lança-de-dragão.

description.english: Reached Boareskyr Bridge, the site of Bhaal's death.
description.french: Atteindre le Pont de Boareskyr, qui vit la mort de Bhaal.
description.italian: Raggiungi il Ponte Boareskyr, il luogo della morte di Bhaal.
description.russian: Доберитесь до Моста Боарескира, места смерти Баала.
description.polish: Dotrzyj do Mostu Boareskyr, miejsca śmierci Bhaala.
description.brazilian: Chegou à Ponte Boareskyr, o local da morte de Bhaal.

description.english: Acquired the wardstone from the Cyricist temple.
description.french: Acquérir la pierre gardienne du temple de Cyric.
description.italian: Ottieni la pietra sigillo dal tempio di Cyric.
description.russian: Найдите охранный камень в храме Цирика.
description.polish: Zdobądź kamień strażniczy ze świątyni Cyrica.
description.brazilian: Adquiriu a pedra de proteção do templo Cyricista.

description.english: Saved Boareskyr Bridge from destruction at the hands of the crusade.
description.french: Empêcher la destruction du Pont de Boareskyr par la croisade.
description.italian: Salva il Ponte Boareskyr dalla distruzione per mano della crociata.
description.russian: Спасите Мост Боарескира от разрушения.
description.polish: Ocal Most Boareskyr od zniszczenia z rąk krucjaty.
description.brazilian: Salvou a Ponte Boareskyr da destruição nas mãos da cruzada.

description.english: Entered the caverns beneath Dragonspear Castle.
description.french: Pénétrer dans les cavernes sous le Château de Lancedragon.
description.italian: Entra nelle caverne sotto il Castello Dragonspear.
description.russian: Войдите в пещеры под Замком Драконьего Копья.
description.polish: Wejdź do jaskiń pod Zamkiem Smoczej Włóczni.
description.brazilian: Entrou nas cavernas sob o Castelo Lança-de-dragão.

description.english: Discovered Hephernaan within Dragonspear Castle.
description.french: Découvrir Hephernaan dans le Château Lancedragon.
description.italian: Scopri Hephernaan dentro il Castello Dragonspear.
description.russian: Найдите Гефернаана в Замке Драконьего Копья.
description.polish: Odszukaj Hephernaana w Zamku Smoczej Włóczni.
description.brazilian: Descobriu Hephernaan dentro do Castelo Lança-de-dragão.

description.english: Successfully defended the coalition camp from attack.
description.french: Défendre le camp de la coalition d'un assaut.
description.italian: Difendi con successo l'accampamento della coalizione dall'attacco.
description.russian: Отбейте атаку на лагерь коалиции.
description.polish: Obroń obóz koalicji podczas ataku.
description.brazilian: Defendeu com sucesso o acampamento da coalizão do ataque.

description.english: Destroyed the devil Belhifet.
description.french: Vaincre le diable Belhifet.
description.italian: Distruggi il diavolo Belhifet.
description.russian: Уничтожьте дьявола Белхифета.
description.polish: Zniszcz diabła o imieniu Belhifet.
description.brazilian: Destruiu o diabo Belhifet.

description.english: Fell to attackers outside Baldur's Gate.
description.french: Tomber dans un piège près de la Porte de Baldur.
description.italian: Affronta la sconfitta per mano degli avversari fuori Baldur's Gate.
description.russian: Выгоните нападающих прочь из Врат Балдура.
description.polish: Ulegnij atakującym nieopodal Wrót Baldura.
description.brazilian: Caiu para atacantes fora de Portão de Baldur.

description.english: Help Ammon in the Korlasz family tomb.
description.french: Aider Ammon dans la tombe de la famille Korlasz.
description.italian: Aiuta Ammon nella tomba di famiglia dei Korlasz.
description.russian: Помогите Аммону в семейной гробнице Корлажа.
description.polish: Pomóż Ammonowi w rodzinnym grobowcu Korlasz.
description.brazilian: Ajude Ammon na tumba da família de Korlasz.

description.english: Discover a secret hidden away in the Korlasz family tomb.
description.french: Découvrir un secret dans la tombe de la famille Korlasz.
description.italian: Scopri un segreto nascosto nella tomba di famiglia dei Korslaz.
description.russian: Обнаружьте тайный проход в семейной гробнице Корлажа.
description.polish: Odkryj tajemnicę skrywaną w rodzinnym grobowcu Korlasz.
description.brazilian: Descubra um segredo escondido da tumba da família de Korlasz.

description.english: Discovered a secret chamber and the treasure hidden within.
description.french: Découvrir une pièce secrète et son trésor caché.
description.italian: Scopri una camera segreta e il tesoro nascosto al suo interno.
description.russian: Обнаружьте потайную комнату и скрытые в ней сокровища.
description.polish: Odkryj tajemną komnatę i ukryty w niej skarb.
description.brazilian: Descobriu uma câmara secreta e o tesouro escondido nela.

description.english: Summon three creatures to the Prime Material Plane using the Spectacles of Spectacle.
description.french: Invoquer trois créatures dans le Plan Matériel en utilisant les Lunettes de Spectacle.
description.italian: Evoca tre creature sul Primo Piano Materiale usando le Lenti dei Portenti.
description.russian: Вызовите трех существ на Первичный Материальный План, используя чудо-очки.
description.polish: Przyzwij trzy istoty z Pierwszej Sfery Materialnej przy użyciu Okularów Widowiska.
description.brazilian: Convoque três criaturas ao Plano Material Primário usando os Óculos de Vistas.

description.english: Slew the green dragon, Morentherene.
description.french: Tuer le dragon vert Morentherene.
description.italian: Uccidi il drago verde Morentherene.
description.russian: Убейте зеленого дракона Морентерена.
description.polish: Zgładź zielonego smoka o imieniu Morentherene.
description.brazilian: Matou o dragão verde Morentherene.

description.english: Talked Teleria into selling her golem.
description.french: Persuader Teleria de vendre son golem.
description.italian: Convinci Teleria a vendere il suo golem.
description.russian: Поговорите с Телерией о продаже ее голема.
description.polish: Nakłoń Telerię do sprzedania swego golema.
description.brazilian: Convenceu Teleria a vender seu golem.

description.english: Stopped the sickening energy emanating from the spellstone.
description.french: Mettre un terme à l'énergie affaiblissante qui émane de la pierre gardienne.
description.italian: Ferma l'energia debilitante emessa dalla pietra incantata.
description.russian: Остановите поток зловредной энергии, исходящей из зачарованного камня.
description.polish: Zatrzymaj osłabiającą energię wydostającą się z kamienia czarów.
description.brazilian: Parou a energia repugnante que emanava da pedra de feitiço.

displayName.english: Not The Battle We Came For
displayName.italian: Non È La Battaglia Per Cui Siamo Venuti
displayName.polish: Nie na taką bitwę się umawialiśmy

description.english: Peacefully surrendered Bridgefort to the crusade.
description.french: Faire en sorte que Bridgefort se rende pacifiquement à la croisade.
description.italian: Fai arrendere pacificamente Bridgefort alla crociata.
description.russian: Мирно сдайте Бриджфорт крестовому походу.
description.polish: Poddaj bez rozlewu krwi Mostowy Fort siłom krucjaty.
description.brazilian: Entregou Ponte-forte pacificamente à cruzada.

description.english: Pushed the crusade back across Boareskyr Bridge.
description.french: Repousser la croisade jusqu'au Pont de Boareskyr.
description.italian: Respingi la crociata oltre il Ponte Boareskyr.
description.russian: Отбросьте крестовый поход от Моста Боарескира.
description.polish: Odeprzyj siły krucjaty poza Most Boareskyr.
description.brazilian: Fez a cruzada recuar pela Ponte Boareskyr.

description.english: Sabotaged the drawbridge at Bridgefort and let the crusaders in.
description.french: Saboter le pont à Bridgefort et laisser les croisés y entrer.
description.italian: Sabota il ponte levatoio a Bridgefort e fai entrare i crociati.
description.russian: Опустите мост в Бриджфорте и впустите крестоносцев.
description.polish: Uszkodź most zwodzony w Mostowym Forcie, wpuszczając do środka krzyżowców.
description.brazilian: Sabotou a ponte levadiça em Ponte-forte e deixou os cruzados entrarem.

description.english: Delivered the amulets of his former companions to Coldhearth.
description.french: Rendre l'amulette de ses anciens compagnons à Cœur-Froid.
description.italian: Consegna a Coldhearth gli amuleti dei suoi vecchi compagni.
description.russian: Доставьте амулеты бывших компаньонов Колдхерту.
description.polish: Dostarcz Zimnemu Płomieniowi amulety jego dawnych kompanów.
description.brazilian: Entregou os amuletos de seus antigos companheiros a Lareira-fria.

description.english: Destroyed the lich Coldhearth and his phylactery.
description.french: Vaincre la liche Cœur-Froid et détruire son phylactère.
description.italian: Distruggi il lich Coldhearth e il suo filatterio.
description.russian: Уничтожьте лича Колдхерта и его филактерию.
description.polish: Zniszcz lisza o imieniu Zimny Płomień wraz z jego filakterium.
description.brazilian: Destruiu o Lich Lareira-fria e seu filactério.

description.english: Destroyed the mind flayer Darskhelin.
description.french: Vaincre Darskhelin le flagelleur mental.
description.italian: Distruggi il mind flayer Darskhelin.
description.russian: Уничтожьте истязателя разума Дарскхелина.
description.polish: Zabij łupieżcę umysłów o imieniu Darskhelin.
description.brazilian: Destruiu o esfolador de mentes Darskhelin.

description.english: Poisoned supplies within Dragonspear Castle.
description.french: Empoisonner les vivres du Château de Lancedragon.
description.italian: Avvelena le provviste dentro il Castello Dragonspear.
description.russian: Отравите припасы в Замке Драгонспир.
description.polish: Zatruj zapasy przechowywane w Zamku Smoczej Włóczni.
description.brazilian: Envenenou os suprimentos do Castelo Lança-de-dragão.

description.english: Recruited Caelar Argent to your side.
description.french: Rallier Caelar Argent à votre cause.
description.italian: Arruola Caelar Argent dalla tua parte.
description.russian: Склоните Целар Аргент на свою сторону.
description.polish: Przekonaj Caelar Srebrzystą, by do ciebie dołączyła.
description.brazilian: Recrutou Caelar Argent para o teu lado.

description.english: Left Caelar Argent behind to guard the portal to the Prime Material Plane.
description.french: Laisser Caelar Argent défendre le portail vers le Plan Matériel.
description.italian: Lascia Caelar Argent a fare la guardia al portale per il Primo Piano Materiale.
description.russian: Оставьте Целар охранять портал на Первичный Материальный План.
description.polish: Zostaw Caelar Srebrzystą, by strzegła portalu do Pierwszej Sfery Materialnej.
description.brazilian: Deixou Caelar Argent para trás para guardar o portal para o Plano Material Primário.

description.english: Left Aun Argent behind to guard the portal to the Prime Material Plane.
description.french: Laisser Aun Argent défendre le portail vers le Plan Matériel.
description.italian: Lascia Aun Argent a fare la guardia al portale per il Primo Piano Materiale.
description.russian: Оставьте Ауна охранять портал на Первичный Материальный План.
description.polish: Zostaw Auna Srebrzystego, by strzegł portalu do Pierwszej Sfery Materialnej.
description.brazilian: Deixou Aun Argent para trás para guardar o portal para o Plano Material Primário.

description.english: Defeat the elite crusader Ashatiel in a one on one battle.
description.french: Vaincre le croisé d'élite Ashatiel dans un combat singulier.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il crociato d'élite Ashatiel in una battaglia uno contro uno.
description.russian: Победите элитного крестоносца Ашатиеля в схватке один на один.
description.polish: Pokonaj elitarnego krzyżowca o imieniu Ashatiel w pojedynku jeden na jednego.
description.brazilian: Derrotou o cruzado elite Ashatiel em um combate um contra um.

description.english: Reunited the spirits of Daeros Dragonspear and Halatathlaer.
description.french: Réunir les esprits de Daeros Lancedragon et Halatathlaer.
description.italian: Riunisci gli spiriti di Daeros Dragonspear e Halatathlaer.
description.russian: Воссоедините духов Даэроса Драгонспира и Халатафлаер.
description.polish: Pojednaj duchy Daerosa Smoczej Włóczni i Halatathlaer'a.
description.brazilian: Reuniu os espíritos de Daeros Lança-de-dragão e Halatathlaer.

description.english: Defeated the elite crusaders guarding the rear of Dragonspear Castle.
description.french: Vaincre les croisés d'élite qui gardent l'entrée arrière du Château Lancedragon.
description.italian: Sconfiggi i crociati d'élite a guardia della parte posteriore del Castello Dragonspear.
description.russian: Победите элитных крестоносцев, охраняющих тыл Замка Драконьего Копья.
description.polish: Pokonaj elitarnych krzyżowców na tyłach Zamku Smoczej Włóczni.
description.brazilian: Derrotou os cruzados elites que guardavam a retaguarda do Castelo Lança-de-dragão.

description.english: Defeated the cabal of wizards hiding within lost Kanaglym.
description.french: Vaincre la cabale de magiciens qui se cachent dans Kanaglym.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la cabala di maghi nascosta dentro la perduta Kanaglym.
description.russian: Победите группу волшебников, скрывающихся в утерянном Канаглиме.
description.polish: Pokonaj koterię czarodziejów ukrywających się w zaginionym Kanaglym.
description.brazilian: Derrotou o grupo de magos que se escondia dentro da perdida Kanaglym.

description.english: Present evidence of the crusade's crimes to Julann.
description.french: Apporter à Julann la preuve des crimes de la croisade.
description.italian: Presenta una prova dei crimini della crociata a Julann.
description.russian: Представьте Джульетте доказательства преступлений крестоносцев.
description.polish: Przedstaw Julann dowody dotyczące zbrodni dokonanych przez krucjatę.
description.brazilian: Apresentou prova dos crimes da cruzada a Julann.

description.english: Find the traitor within the coalition camp.
description.french: Découvrir qui est le traître dans la coalition.
description.italian: Trova il traditore nell'accampamento della coalizione.
description.russian: Найдите предателя в лагере коалиции.
description.polish: Odkryj szpiega w obozie koalicji.
description.brazilian: Encontre o traidor dentro do acampamento da coalizão.

description.english: Perform a task worthy of the Terrible Trivium.
description.french: Accomplir une tâche digne du Terrible Trivium.
description.italian: Esegui un compito degno del Terribile Trivio.
description.russian: Выполните задачу, достойную ужасного тривиума.
description.polish: Wykonaj zadanie godne Straszliwego Trivium.
description.brazilian: Realize uma tarefa digna do Trívio Terrível.

description.english: Convinced Duke Belt that you weren't responsible for Skie's murder.
description.french: Persuader le Duc Belt que vous n'avez rien à voir avec le meurtre de Skie.
description.italian: Convinci il Duca Belt che non sei responsabile dell'assassinio di Skie.
description.russian: Убедите Великого Герцога Белта, что вы не виновны в смерти Ски.
description.polish: Przekonaj księcia Belta, że nie odpowiadasz za śmierć Skie.
description.brazilian: Convenceu Duque Belt de que você não foi responsável pelo assassinato de Skie.

description.english: Persuade Rigah to turn against Julann.
description.french: Persuader Rigah de se retourner contre Julann.
description.italian: Persuadi Rigah a rivoltarsi contro Julann.
description.russian: Настройте Ригаха против Джуланн.
description.polish: Przekonaj Rigaha, by zwrócił się przeciw Julann.
description.brazilian: Convença Rigah a se voltar contra Julann.

displayName.english: In the Name of the Father

description.english: Commanded Madele to murder in the name of Bhaal.
description.french: Commander à Madele de tuer au nom de Bhaal.
description.italian: Ordina a Madele di uccidere nel nome di Bhaal.
description.russian: Прикажите Маделе убить во имя Баала.
description.polish: Rozkaż Madele, by dokonała morderstwa w imię Bhaala.
description.brazilian: Mandou Madele matar em nome de Bhaal.

description.english: Ordered Madele to amend her murderous misdeeds.
description.french: Commander à Madele de se racheter pour ses nombreux méfaits.
description.italian: Ordina a Madele di fare ammenda per le sue sanguinarie malefatte.
description.russian: Накажите Маделе исправить ее злодеяния.
description.polish: Rozkaż Madele, by zaprzestała swych morderczych występków.
description.brazilian: Mandou Madele corrigir seus crimes.

description.english: Fail to impress the ancient menhirs with your singing ability.
description.french: Échouer à impressionner les anciens menhirs avec votre voix.
description.italian: Non hai impressionato gli antichi menhir con la tua abilità canora.
description.russian: Не впечатлите древние менгиры своей способностью петь.
description.polish: Zawiedź oczekiwania starożytnych menhirów podczas swych wokalnych występów.
description.brazilian: Falhe em impressionar os menires antigos com a tua habilidade de música.

description.english: Side with Tsolak the vampire.
description.french: Se ranger du côté de Tsolak le vampire.
description.italian: Alleati con il vampiro Tsolak.
description.russian: Поддержите вампира Тсолака.
description.polish: Stań po stronie wampira Tsolaka.
description.brazilian: Alie-se a Tsolak o vampiro.

description.english: Defeated the burglars in Sorcerous Sundries by yourself.
description.french: Vaincre seul les cambrioleurs du magasin des Marchandises Magiques.
description.italian: Sconfiggi da solo i ladri nel negozio Chincaglierie Magiche.
description.russian: Единолично победите грабителей в «Волшебных принадлежностях».
description.polish: Pokonaj samotnie włamywaczy w Czarodziejskich Rozmaitościach.
description.brazilian: Derrotou os assaltantes no Diversos Sobrenaturais sozinho.

description.english: Save all the missing refugees in the Coast Way forest.
description.french: Sauver tous les réfugiés disparus de la Côte des Épées.
description.italian: Salva tutti i rifugiati scomparsi nella foresta della Strada della Costa.
description.russian: Спасите всех пропавших беженцев в лесу Прибрежного Пути.
description.polish: Ocal wszystkich zaginionych uchodźców w lesie nieopodal Nadbrzeżnego Traktu.
description.brazilian: Salve todos os refugiados desaparecidos na floresta do Caminho da Costa.

description.english: Find all of Takos's missing heirlooms.
description.french: Retrouver tous trésors de famille disparus de Tako.
description.italian: Trova tutti i cimeli smarriti di Takos.
description.russian: Найдите все пропавшие реликвии Такоса.
description.polish: Odnajdź wszystkie brakujące pamiątki Takosa.
description.brazilian: Encontre todos as relíquias de família de Takos.

description.english: Deal with an angry water elemental.
description.french: Traiter avec un élémentaire d'eau mécontent.
description.italian: Affronta un elementale dell'acqua arrabbiato.
description.russian: Разберитесь с разъяренным водным элементалем.
description.polish: Rozpraw się z rozzłoszczonym żywiołakiem wody.
description.brazilian: Lide com um elemental da água zangado.

displayName.italian: In Forma a Suon di Frustate

description.english: Train all of Vigilant Halasan's recruits properly.
description.french: Entraîner correctement toutes les recrues du Vigilant Halasan.
description.italian: Addestra adeguatamente tutte le reclute della Vigilante Halasan.
description.russian: Обучите рекрутов дозорного Халасана.
description.polish: Przeszkol odpowiednio wszystkich rekrutów Czujnej Halasan.
description.brazilian: Treine adequadamente todos os recrutas da Vigilante Halasan.

description.english: Sided with the surface druids at the underground river entrance.
description.french: Se ranger du côté des druides de la surface à l'entrée de la rivière souterraine.
description.italian: Alleati con i druidi della superficie all'ingresso del fiume sotterraneo.
description.russian: Поддержите друидов поверхности у прохода к подземной реке.
description.polish: Stań po stronie druidów z powierzchni u podziemnego ujścia rzeki.
description.brazilian: Aliou-se aos druidas da superfície na entrada do rio subterrâneo.

description.english: Sided with Ferrusk at the dark druid circle.
description.french: Se ranger du côté de Ferrusk au cercle des druides de l'ombre.
description.italian: Alleati con Ferrusk del circolo druidico oscuro.
description.russian: Поддержите Ферруска в круге темного друида.
description.polish: Stań po stronie Ferruska w kręgu mrocznych druidów.
description.brazilian: Aliou-se a Ferrusk no círculo sombrio.

description.english: Track down all of Glint's family members.
description.french: Retrouver tous les membres de la famille de Glint.
description.italian: Rintraccia tutti i membri della famiglia di Glint.
description.russian: Выследите всех членов семьи Глинта.
description.polish: Odszukaj wszystkich członków rodziny Glinta.
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os membros da família de Glint.

description.english: Get the strange voice out of Neera's head.
description.french: Aider Neera à se débarrasser de l'étrange voix dans sa tête.
description.italian: Fai smettere la strana voce nella testa di Neera.
description.russian: Избавьте Ниру от странного голоса в голове.
description.polish: Pozbądź się dziwnego głosu z głowy Neery.
description.brazilian: Tire a estranha voz da cabeça de Neera.

description.english: Aid Khalid with his romantic request.
description.french: Assister Khalid dans sa requête romantique.
description.italian: Aiuta Khalid con la sua romantica richiesta.
description.russian: Выполните романтичную просьбу Кхалида.
description.polish: Pomóż Khalidowi w jego romantycznej misji.
description.brazilian: Ajude Khalid com seu pedido romântico.

description.english: Help M'Khiin find her path.
description.french: Aider M'Khiin à trouver sa voie.
description.italian: Aiuta M'Khiin a trovare la sua strada.
description.russian: Помогите М'Кхиин найти ее путь.
description.polish: Pomóż M'Khiin w odnalezieniu jej ścieżki.
description.brazilian: Ajude M'Khiin a achar seu caminho.

description.english: Convinced Corwin that you did not commit murder.
description.french: Persuader Corwin que vous n'avez pas commis un meurtre.
description.italian: Convinci Corwin che non hai commesso un omicidio.
description.russian: Убедите Корвин, что вы не совершали убийства.
description.polish: Przekonaj Corwin, że nie jesteś mordercą.
description.brazilian: Convenceu Corwin de que você não cometeu o assassinato.

description.english: Have Baeloth, Viconia, M'Khiin, Dorn, and Edwin in the same party.
description.french: Avoir Baeloth, Viconia, M'Khiin, Dorn et Edwin dans le groupe en même temps.
description.italian: Arruola Baeloth, Viconia, M'Khiin, Dorn e Edwin nello stesso gruppo.
description.russian: Соберите вместе Баэлота, Виконию, М'Кхиин, Дорна и Эдвина.
description.polish: Dołącz do swojej drużyny Baelotha, Viconię, M'Khiin, Dorna i Edwina.
description.brazilian: Tenha Baeloth, Viconia, M'Khiin, Dorn e Edwin na mesma equipe.

description.english: Have Corwin, Glint, M'Khiin, and Voghiln in the same party.
description.french: Avoir Corwin, Glint, M'Khiin et Voghiln dans le groupe en même temps.
description.italian: Arruola Corwin, Glint, M'Khiin e Voghiln nello stesso gruppo.
description.russian: Соберите вместе Корвин, Глинта, М'Кхиин и Вогильна.
description.polish: Dołącz do swojej drużyny Corwin, Glinta, M'Khiin i Voghlina.
description.brazilian: Tenha Corwin, Glint, M'Khiin e Voghiln na mesma equipe.

description.english: Thrix claimed a party member's soul.
description.french: Laisser Thrix prendre l'âme d'un membre du groupe.
description.italian: Thrix ha reclamato l'anima di un membro del gruppo.
description.russian: Отдайте Триксу душу одного из ваших компаньонов.
description.polish: Thrix zdobył duszę jednego z członków drużyny.
description.brazilian: Thrix se apossou da alma de um membro da equipe.

description.english: Reunite with old friends.
description.french: Se retrouver entre vieux amis.
description.italian: Riunisciti con i vecchi amici.
description.russian: Воссоединитесь со старыми друзьями.
description.polish: Spotkaj się ponownie z dawnymi przyjaciółmi.
description.brazilian: Reuna-se com os teus velhos amigos.

description.english: Explore all unique encounters.
description.french: Découvrir toutes les rencontres uniques aléatoires.
description.italian: Scopri tutti gli incontri unici.
description.russian: Обнаружьте все уникальные случайные встречи.
description.polish: Odkryj wszystkie losowe spotkania.
description.brazilian: Explore todos os encontros únicos.

description.english: Forged a dragonscale item.
description.french: Forger un objet en écailles de dragon.
description.italian: Forgia un oggetto con scaglie di drago.
description.russian: Изготовьте предмет из драконьей чешуи.
description.polish: Wykuj przemiot ze smoczych łusek.
description.brazilian: Forjou um objeto de escama de dragão.

description.english: Forged a void weapon.
description.french: Forger une arme du vide.
description.italian: Forgia un'arma del vuoto.
description.russian: Изготовьте оружие бездны.
description.polish: Wykuj broń próżniową.
description.brazilian: Forjou uma arma do vazio.

description.english: Use infravision to navigate an area of darkness.
description.french: Avoir recours à l'infravision pour se repérer dans une zone de ténèbres.
description.italian: Usa l'infravisione per farti strada in un'area di oscurità.
description.russian: Используйте инфравидение для ориентации в темноте.
description.polish: Skorzystaj z infrawizji do odnajdywania drogi w ciemnościach.
description.brazilian: Use a infravisão para percorrer uma área escura.

description.english: Acquired a gold bust of yourself.
description.french: Acquérir un buste d'or de vous-même.
description.italian: Ottieni un busto d'oro che ti rappresenta.
description.russian: Получите свой золотой бюст.
description.polish: Nabądź złote popiersie ze swoją podobizną.
description.brazilian: Adquira um busto seu de ouro.

displayName.french: Le Coup est Parti Tout Seul...

description.english: Killed Nüber.
description.french: Tuer Nüber.
description.italian: Uccidi Nüber.
description.russian: Убейте Нюбера.
description.polish: Zabij Nübera
description.brazilian: Matou Nüber.

displayName.english: I'm A Wizard and That Looks...
displayName.italian: Sono un Mago e Quello Sembra...
displayName.polish: Jestem czarodziejem, a to wygląda na...
displayName.brazilian: Sou um Mago, e Isso Parece...

description.english: Murdered the trapped crusaders in the Temple of Cyric.
description.french: Tuer les croisés piégés dans le temple de Cyric.
description.italian: Uccidi i crociati intrappolati nel tempio di Cyric.
description.russian: Убейте попавших в ловушку крестоносцев в храме Цирика.
description.polish: Wymorduj uwięzionych w świątyni Cyrica krzyżowców.
description.brazilian: Matou os cruzados aprisionados no Templo de Cyric.

description.english: Recruit all the bonus allies possible for the final battle.
description.french: Recruter tous les alliés possibles pour la bataille finale.
description.italian: Arruola tutti gli alleati possibili per la battaglia finale.
description.russian: Получите всех возможных союзников в финальной битве.
description.polish: Zwerbuj wszystkich dodatkowych sojuszników podczas ostatecznej bitwy.
description.brazilian: Recrute todos os aliados bônus possíveis para a batalha final.

description.english: Fight all the bonus enemies possible at the final battle.
description.french: Combattre tous les adversaires possibles lors de la bataille finale.
description.italian: Combatti tutti i nemici possibili nella battaglia finale.
description.russian: Победите всех возможных врагов в финальной битве.
description.polish: Pokonaj wszystkich dodatkowych przeciwników podczas ostatecznej bitwy.
description.brazilian: Enfrente todos os inimigos bônus possíveis na batalha final.

description.english: Picked the least suitable units to fight the crusaders at the coalition camp.
description.french: Choisir l'unité la moins adaptée pour combattre les croisés au camp de la coalition.
description.italian: Scegli le unità meno adatte per combattere i crociati all'accampamento della coalizione.
description.russian: Выберите самые неподходящие подразделения для борьбы с крестоносцами в лагере коалиции.
description.polish: Wybierz najmniej odpowiednie jednostki do walki z krzyżowcami o obóz koalicji.
description.brazilian: Escolheu as unidades menos apropriadas para enfrentar os cruzados no acampamento da coalizão.

description.english: Revealed your identity to the crusaders.
description.french: Révéler son identité aux croisés.
description.italian: Rivela la tua identità ai crociati.
description.russian: Раскройте свою личность крестоносцам.
description.polish: Ujawnij swoją tożsamość krucjacie.
description.brazilian: Revelou a tua identidade para os cruzados.

description.english: Answered the menhir's riddle, Vidhyadar's riddle, and Thrix's riddle correctly.
description.french: Répondre correctement aux énigmes du menhir, de Vidyadhar et de Thrix.
description.italian: Rispondi correttamente agli indovinelli dei menhir, di Vidyadhar e di Thrix.
description.russian: Ответьте верно на загадки менгира, Видьядхара и Трикса.
description.polish: Odgadnij zagadkę menhirów oraz zagadki Vidyadhara i Thrixa.
description.brazilian: Respondeu a charada do menir, a charada de Vidyadhar, e a charada de Thrix corretamente.
